function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of knowledge about the vital concentration of SARS-CoV-2 necessary to infect a human from inanimate surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission from contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Conduct research to determine the vital concentration and implement strict surface cleaning protocols","Technologies":"Surface disinfection technologies, such as UV-C light and antiviral surface coatings","People":"General population, especially those in high-traffic or high-risk environments","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, and facility management"}]}
